text: (oba ekkasu vi jivat viya hæki obage) bharyayavanva oba ovun veta hita suva læbima pinisa obagenma ohu nirmanaya kara, oba atare adarayada karunavada æti kara tibimada, ohuge sadhakayangen æti dæyayi. sita vataha gata hæki janatavata mehida niyata vasayenma (ekak nova, bohomayak) sadhakayan æta
